summary: A mixture of cyberpunk/steampunk resulted in this odd blade.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod for skyrim. It won\'t be to everyone\'s taste, it is most definitely probably NOT lore friendly. Craftable and upgradable, under the ebony category.

2handed version added, you can have both 1h and 2h at the same time without conflicts. You must download the main file regardless of which version you use.

Courtsey of Memorablelol here\'s a vid of the sword and the very cool cleric armor.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ilRMAnRYl8



Installation
Download the main file first. Copy all files in the Data directory to your Skyrim/Data directory. If you want 2handed version, copy the files from the optional zip to your Skyrim/Data directory.

If you only want 2h delete:

Skyrim/Data/cyberpunkblade.esm
Skyrim/Data/meshes/cyberpunkblade/1stpersoncyberpunkblade.nif
Skyrim/Data/textures/cyberpunkblade/cyberpunkblade.nif

If you only want 1h, don\'t download the optional file, just the main one.

Comments/criticisms welcome.

Uninstallation
Delete:
Skyrim/Data/cyberpunkblade.esm
Skyrim/Data/cyberpunkblade2h.esm
Skyrim/Data/meshes/cyberpunkblade -directory
Skyrim/Data/textures/cyberpunkblade -directory


Known issues
Minor clipping occasionally; some can\'t be changed without editing skeletons (or so I hear).
Glow might be too bright or too dull, depending if you use any ENB. The effect is fairly subtle under vanilla skyrim.
2h version is not craftable yet, I\'ll try to update it soon. In the meantime you\'ll have to use the console to get it.


Credits
Bethesda for the great game

Tools used
Softimage
Photoshop
Nifscope
author: SaoriDestiny
